entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
